short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides summaries for movies and TV shows on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To avoid spoilers, the No Summary For You! extension hides summaries/synopses on Netflix by blurring them until you hover your cursor over them. The blur can also be toggled using the toolbar button for Netflix sessions where you want to read the summaries, e.g. when looking for a new movie or TV show to start bingeing!
